phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te

gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par

shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes

bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te

gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis

zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /

mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi

bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ rna

ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas

shing kun du shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te

reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug

bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug

bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ mig lnga dang /

mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la

gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas

shing kun du shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba

dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi 'thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo zhes kho bo smra'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa

mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag

ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi

zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar

mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa

shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam

par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang

chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/

stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la

mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i

skal ba yod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /

khas len kyang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas len pa yang ma yin/ khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes

bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin

du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du

mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/ tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin

gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang

po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas

la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon

mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed

pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan

rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa

dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi

'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam

par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med pa la

brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha'

ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge

'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor kyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug

par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhig /byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'

nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'

yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe

dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun du shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun du shes pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras

pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun du shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis

smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing / kun du mi shes so/ /shA ri'i

bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ des rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med

pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu

bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bsam

gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de

ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin

pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/ de yang mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing

'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir

'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag

pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom

pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang

lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa

dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa

lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa

so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu

ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du

byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams yod pa ma

yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag

pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag

ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no/ /ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing

'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de dag ni

nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni ma dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya ba ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar

dag la ma dad pa yin no/ /de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du

phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa

rnams shes bya'o/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa

yin no/ /mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon

par zhen pa yin no/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /

byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas

pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims

kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags nas mngon

par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges

par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i
le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/

de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs

nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur

ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig /rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du

sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba dang sna dang /

lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin

snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes

pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /

lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin

snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin
snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du

sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags

la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma

yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang / dri dang ro dang /

reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par

shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i

rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg

pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi

'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/

sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan

ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang

gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma

lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan

ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma

lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan

ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par

'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po
lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod
dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang gdags

pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag

pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la

bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam

du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su

ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges

par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis

pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /

smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu

ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis

pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags

te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis

dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na

skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi

mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang

dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag

gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa

dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal

ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de

yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes

dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la

zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma

med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor

rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor

rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab

'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis

sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya

ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces

bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan bar bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes

bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya

ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par

shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i

rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis

gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /

gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med

ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi

'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar tu gcod par byed pa

dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing

dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid

kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid

kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid

kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams

stong pa ma yin gyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid

kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/

yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /

stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma

yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ /mig

gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam gyi stong pa nyid

kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lam mo/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin

gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces

bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin

du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs

par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon

pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa

'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes

bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med

ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /

bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos

mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben

zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /

mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya

ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan

thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang lus dang /

yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /

mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab

'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /

lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi

bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis

yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa

thabs la mi mkhas pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs

phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa

nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig

nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa

nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong

pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang /

sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna

ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom

sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo

nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing / de dag kyang

dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par

mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni

snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /bsgom par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /

gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byed du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung tu 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
