pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims

kyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/
rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can

sangs rgyas kyi cha byad tu bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung

ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing /

bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi

sems cung zad kyang med do/ /khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no/ /khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag

de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag

dang bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /

lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus

te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol

du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po

rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor

gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub

sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag

mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed do zhes bdud kyi las

de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang 'bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod

kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du

rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon

sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor

gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /

bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna

ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /

mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /

zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /

mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba

dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud

kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
las/ sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i

don to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub dang / sems dpa' la skye ba dang yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/

sems dpa' la yang gzhi med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med

cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa

nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba

dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i

don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang /

dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi

dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /

lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don

kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs

so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs

so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do/ /dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag
gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /

dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi

ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab

'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams

kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med

pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang

chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon

mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di

lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do/ /rab

'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i

gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i

don med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de

bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin du rnam par dag pa

la gzhi med do/ /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul

khrims la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor

'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par

ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha

rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha

rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag
thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos

thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong

du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang

bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go/ /rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i

dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong tu 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po

dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du

shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /

rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes

su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa

rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa

dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te rab 'byor

de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan

pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad

dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par

'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun

shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /

nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las

yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di

ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni

rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam

pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po

bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis

pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la

gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas
bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /

de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam

shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs

nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /

de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /

de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum

bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang /

gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /

chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs

med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu

dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab

par bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur
bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs

chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang /

rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ /rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag

gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems cad thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /
sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub

pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed

pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong

bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam tu sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong tu sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis

sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems

can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems

can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /phyis 'dod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags

la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags

kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can

thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya
ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos kun du dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la kun du

dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod

pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun du dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang / phan yon du lta

ba ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes

bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen

po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub

kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /

sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/

rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin

par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems

can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gcig
pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag

kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu

lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang /

byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang /

med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched tu lta ba dang / bden par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /

stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs

rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad tu/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/

don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan

pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du

shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis

pas/ don des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su

mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la yang skye ba

'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye

ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/

rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su

gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang

chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med

do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing / khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi

sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang

bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa

rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis

stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs

su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing

khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo

brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa

med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa

yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab

'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa

yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba
med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste
bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems

can chen po de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems

can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can

thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad

kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson

'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig

ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang

sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol

du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos

dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems

rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi

dmigs len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol du phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa

la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du

phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul

khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis

stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i

bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag

gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba

dag gis/ sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson

'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa

yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /

dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang

ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing / chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog

ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams

cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su

bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa

dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa bsgom zhing / de pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms

par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro myang

bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rig par

bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po

yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi

zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched tu brjod pa ched tu rjod cing bsngags pa yang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa yang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bus

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras

pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben

pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par

byas te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/

nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis

pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha'

mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa

dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong

ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan

dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/

nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu

'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig

rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang rjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/ rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan

dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la yang gnas la 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/

sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa

ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par

'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan

dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong

pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin

bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /

snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi

ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha

rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu

'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing / 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
